page.description: Can be used to create a fixed-size, scrollable repeating section.
page.discussion: The *[ui:Scrollable container]* property defines whether or not the repeating section should be a fixed width and height. If checked, the following properties are exposed so you can define the width, height, and styling for the repeating section:

item.name: [Scrollable container height]
item.description: The height of the scrollable container.

item.name: [Scrollable container width]
item.description: The width of the scrollable container.

item.name: [Scrollable container in-line style]
item.description: The in-line style of the scrollable container.

item.name: [Scrollable container class name]
item.description: The class name of the scrollable container.
